p: Between Feb 17, and July 22, 2016, we sequentially enrolled 75 participants, 25 assigned to each dose group ( figure 1 ). Participant demographic characteristics are in table 1 . Reasons for non-enrolment are in the appendix (p 10), including 15 individuals who were excluded for increases in creatine phosphokinase related to vigorous exercise regimens. Mean age of participants was 32·2 years (SD 9·3). Ten participants were excluded from the per-protocol analysis because they did not complete all study visits ( figure 1).
